Text: FW YogaHello Mr Derrick It was a pleasure talking to you yesterday about our yoga classes it was very interesting hearing your opinion about the Power Yoga I also mentioned to you that I am running a marathon in Hawaii on December I am running on behalf of Sarah a cute year old girl that has arthritis since she was months old and she hasnt been able to be a normal kid If you dont mind I would like to ask you if you will be so kind to sponsor me with a small donation to this worthy organization I actually committed to collect for them to be able to run de marathon and I was doing so great that I almost had it made but today when we received the email about no more matching donations put me a little bit behind Please let me know and I could send Joey to pick up the donation If not please dont feel bad I understand we are going through very hard times lately Thank you so much Mr Derrick and I will be seeing you at the yoga class if you can make it on Saturday Candy Smith Ste EB
